DataElement.preferredDefinition: a numerical quantity related to the amount used in the process of flooding fluid through the artery to saturate the surrounding tissue during a medical procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the amount used in the process of flooding fluid through the artery to saturate the surrounding tissue during a medical procedure

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Bathing an organ or tissue with a fluid. In regional perfusion, a specific area of the body (usually an arm or a leg) receives high doses of anticancer drugs through a blood vessel. Such a procedure is performed to treat cancer that has not spread.:Volume; the amount of 3-dimensional space occupied by an object.

Concepts.definition: The process of flooding fluid through the artery to saturate the surrounding tissue. In regional perfusion, a specific area of the body (usually an arm or a leg) is targeted and high doses of anticancer drugs are flooded through the artery to reach the surrounding tissue and kill as many cancer cells as possible. Such a procedure is performed in cases where the cancer is not thought to have spread past a localized area.
The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed of perfusate volume.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
